title: Woman who mowed down two tourists on pavement in Majorca 'fell asleep at the wheel'
text:
A woman who mowed down two tourists leaving one dead after losing control of her BMW has claimed she fell asleep at the wheel.

The unnamed 52-year-old Spaniard was released pending an ongoing criminal probe after appearing before a judge at a court in the Majorcan capital Palma yesterday. She hid her head under a jacket as she was led into court.

A 39-year-old German woman was killed in the horror accident around 4.30pm on Friday on Palma's seafront promenade and a 33-year-old British man left critically injured.

An unnamed 52-year-old Spaniard was released pending an ongoing investigation after two tourists were mowed down on a street in the Majorcan capital Parma on Friday

Hospital sources said last night he remained in intensive care.

The pair were part of a group of mainly British tourists who had jetted to the island for a short holiday the day before the accident.

Island newspaper Ultima Hora said today several were doctors who had studied together at Manchester University, quoting one as saying: 'They called us and told us something terrible had happened and we should go to a hospital called Son Espases.

'We are in shock, we still can't believe it.'

The woman driving the BMW that mounted the pavement and careered into them passed a breath test.

The woman who had been driving the BMW 4x4 that mounted the pavement and careered into the tourists later passed a breath test

The holidaymakers were trapped under the BMW when it hit them after careering into street signs and a traffic light

A police spokesman said yesterday tests to try to establish the speed she was going at were still ongoing.

She was arrested on suspicion of a crime of causing death and injury by wreckless driving and is expected to face a manslaughter charge at the end of a judicial probe into the incident.

The holidaymakers were trapped under the BMW when it hit them after careering into street signs and a traffic light.

The woman went into cardiac arrest and died at the scene despite attempts by paramedics to save her.

The man suffered serious head injuries and had to be stabilised at the scene.
description: The unnamed Spanish woman, 52, claimed she 'fell asleep' when she mounted the pavement in Palma, Majorca and knocked down two tourists.
